website_summaries.verdict: Gets very high marks for its quality and durability, but buyers really rave about the grill mat.
pros: Makes 4.05-inch regular and stuffed burgers, and 2.76-inch sliders
Comes with a nonstick, heat-resistant grill mat to keep food from sticking to the grill
Includes 50 wax patty papers, as well as links to online videos with recipes and tips
cons: Some felt that the slider press was too small
Some burgers may stick to the ridges of the removable plate

customer_reviews.title: Great Burger Press
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. Simple yet completely functional, even my daughter can make burgers with me! I like that it comes with the grill mat, its very useful when grilling. I use the grill mat and it keeps everything neat and clean. This is a great choice for anyone from a novice to an expert chef. Very useful and handy at an economical price. Its a good "add on" gift for family or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the  PERFECT burger.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for preparing Stuffed burgers. For even better results spray all press parts with a ltitle cooking oil so the burgers won't stick to the press. I also found that it's better NOT to add shredded cheese inside the burger because it leaks out all over the grill. Stuff the burgers with anything else you like but add your sliced cheese to the top of your burgers to prevent any mess.
customer_reviews.author: Jwderos

customer_reviews.title: ... and makes perfectly shaped patties for even cooking (works great for my plant-based patties
customer_reviews.text: Quality product that functions as promised and makes perfectly shaped patties for even cooking (works great for my plant-based patties, too). Packaged arrived early, although a small part was missing. I emailed vendor and got a reply in just 2 hours saying they were sending a full replacement kit immediately. New kit arrived quickly. I must say the KROM company really takes their customer service seriously and worked until I was 100% satisfied. Good job, KROM.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL K

customer_reviews.title: Got it mainly for the mat and the great price. The mat worked well -- have been ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it mainly for the mat and the great price. The mat worked well -- have been a pain grilling veggies, but this was perfect. Didn't think I would use the burger makers much because I'm used to just using my hands, but have found the burger molds actually made the process much easier and everything looked way more uniform and professional. Plus, with kids, the molds help them make nice round patties each time. Highly recommend if you grill or make a lot of burgers.
customer_reviews.author: Lin Kwan

customer_reviews.title: The perfect burger
customer_reviews.text: I loved the the burger press kit and grill Mat, I was excited to get it and begin using it. The burgers didn’t only look good but tasted amazing. I decided to be creative and wrapped the burgers w bacon. The kit is really easy to use. My kids helped me and had fun making the burgers. It was a lot more entertaining for them using the kit. I also liked that I am able to make different size burgers, considering there are always kids in my house. Additionally I used the Mat to cook some grilled vegetables. My meal was quite a success. I have attached the picture of the burgers cooked in a convection oven.
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to be creative!
customer_reviews.text: I used this kit for preparing veggie burgers and it worked perfectly. I was a bit concern about using the mat in the oven but as it says It can handle high temperature I took the risk and nothing happened. The mat actually works too. I haven't tried the mat in a bbq. I also used the kid to serve rice and make it look nice in the place. I like to make my food look different so I am using these pieces to shape rice and salads too. I recommend this kit for people who are creative in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kha

customer_reviews.title: Food network style burgers!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite burgers to make are burgers stuffed with blue cheese and thats exactly what I made soon as this arrived.I love using this press. It is so easy to use and my son actually used it with me to make sliders. The grill mat and the press can go in the dishwasher which is a plus. Its a yes for me . Ill post pictures of my iron chef burgers on our next burger night!!
customer_reviews.author: Maya l.

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect burgers and they’re stuffed!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would order something like this but...I tried to make my own stuffed burgers in the past but they just never came out right. This tool works great so far, I just need to work on the stuffing specifics - how much to put in the middle, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Grimmace

customer_reviews.title: For the Burger Lover!
customer_reviews.text: Though this item may seem confusing to use at first, it comes with perfectly succinct instructions. Not only are there great instructions but there are also amazing stuffed burger recipes. This item has made cooking stuffed burgers a lot easier; no more broken and half cooked burgers. The mat is easy to clean and fits perfectly on top of a grill (which in turn can be used for other meats.)
customer_reviews.author: Olivia O.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't press the patties flat because the plastic is not sturdy enough to stay rigid with pressure. The mold is good for hand pressing, but that is it.
customer_reviews.author: RDavid

customer_reviews.title: I just received this product and absolutely love it! Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product and absolutely love it! Great customer service, prompt delivery and among all very useful product. Must have item for any new and existing chef. I absolutely loved cooking my burgers using Burger Press Kit. The grill mat was also useful and a perfect addition to this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Bella V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and works great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was thrilled when the burger chef showed up! The grill was fired up in 3 minutes and the grill mat was already in place with some delicious veggies. The burger press was super easy to use and made a perfect size burger. Dinner time!
customer_reviews.author: Sje2016

customer_reviews.title: Great burger press !
customer_reviews.text: I'm addicted to this burger press. I love stuffing my burgers and everything stays in place. It is the perfect burger size and slider size. Its convenient especially for a bbq party . the mat fits perfectly on my grill where I like to do my fish and veggies . No aluminum foil needed!
customer_reviews.author: yolanda gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We haven't yet tried out the grill mat (waiting for grilling weather), but excited to try it out. The press itself works great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Looks great to me
customer_reviews.text: I bought three different presses from Amazon for three different family members. I figured they could compare notes and see if one was a standout over the others. Stay tuned for feedback come BBQ time.
customer_reviews.author: itsjoan

customer_reviews.title: Hamburger press
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I don't see the point in the small press because by the time the sliders are cooked they are about the size of an oreo. The press works great except for one thing, The removable plate with the ridges gets stuck to the hamburger so you have to be careful pulling it off or the hamburger will tear.
customer_reviews.author: Frank g

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: Well made but I wish the size of the mold had a bigger circumference, after they cooked they were a little small for the bun.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Great Burger Tool Helps You Upgrade Your Burgers
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful burger tool! It made it easy to put cheese and onions in the burger and flattened the burger enough so that it stuck together during the cooking process and after. The pieces are dishwasher safe and they were cleaned in one cycle (I've had issues with other companies' burger tools getting cleaned in one cycle). It comes with sheets, so you can make a ton of parties at once ahead of time. Overall, 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to make delicious Stuffed Burgers! I never understood how people made those burgers with the fillings inside, but now I'm one of them! I'll use this to spice up my Burgers all the time now!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great to cook with!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about this product at first but once I tried it I loved it! I made some really great burgers for my family, and it was easy for me to add onions, parsley, and other garnishes to give the burgers some really great flavor. The video tutorials on the website are very helpful, and give you some ideas on how to be creative cooking with the burger chef. Cooking is one of my favorite things to do, so I’m glad I now have the burger chef to assist me.
customer_reviews.author: Kareem Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Have used it once and it’s not super sturdy but it worked great and I can’t see why it won’t last for a while
customer_reviews.author: Treepeddler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome burger press!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an effective yet affordable burger press... This does the trick! We made all kinds of burgers over the weekend, salmon burgers, Turkey burgers, stuffed cheddar burgers and sliders! I have no complaints. The patties came our perfect and they didn't fall apart! Winner winner burger dinner!
customer_reviews.author: Khaliea C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Burger press! Purchased for a family reunion bbq, was able to make 50 burgers in 30mins!!
customer_reviews.author: MomofFour

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Would recommend to anytime who wants uniformity with their burgers. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: The burger press works like a charm, super easy to use and the instructional videos are clear and to the point. I wasn't familiar with the grill mat and wanted to give it a try: this thing is incredible! Heats up very quickly when you put it on the bbq, and you can grill anything from burgers to fish and veggies...basically whatever suits your needs. The mat also cleans up in 5 minutes, which is a big plus...def a game changer! Very highly recommended kit!
customer_reviews.author: Antoine

customer_reviews.title: Works as described and you can make perfect burgers and sliders every time
customer_reviews.text: Works as described and you can make perfect burgers and sliders every time. Very easy to clean and this is a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: You put the meat in and press it down. Not much you can say about it. I bought a scale to weigh the amount.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: The molds are perfect. I had never made sliders at home before
customer_reviews.text: Takes so much work out of making your own burgers at home! The molds are perfect. I had never made sliders at home before, but this made it possible to make restaurant quality sliders! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: muirlin

customer_reviews.title: Great burger press!
customer_reviews.text: I love the mat and the press kit for grilling burgers. It makes having burgers in winter months something to look forward to when outdoor grilling isn't a possibility!
customer_reviews.author: STA

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Best shape hamburgers ever, great product. The mat it wasn't what I expected. Let say I just preferred to cook without the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Saiyan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and it was a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A Foster

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know I needed this until my husband ordered one for our home! Love the Burger Kit, especially the mat! The kit worked as it was suppose to and the parts, including mat are easy to clean. I made regular chicken burgers but my husband has requested stuffed burgers next time and I’m excited to oblige. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: love the
customer_reviews.text: use it many many times during grilling season, love the versatility
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My first stuffed home made burger
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was fast. Its easy to use. I like that i was able to use it in my oven instead of having to use my outdoor grill. What i love most is its not messy like using my palm of hand to mold my burgers!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fast, and easy
customer_reviews.text: If your a parent with a full time job and want to cut down on meal prep, then the Burger Press Kit is for you. My son loves burgers so I couldn't go wrong with this. It was quick and easy to use. The burgers are on the small side but very delicious. The tutorial video was helpful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenicia B.

customer_reviews.title: I received my Burger Chef and just loved it! It's the perfect size to make a ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my Burger Chef and just loved it! It's the perfect size to make a scrumptious burger filled with your favorite fillings. It was my first experience with using a grill mat that didn't require scrubbing like when you cook on a grill. I was able to stuff my burger and enjoy a home cooked meal.
customer_reviews.author: Samon B.

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed making a stuffed burger with this burger press
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed making a stuffed burger with this burger press. Super easy and the mat was nice to use on the grill! The video tutorials were really helpful in how to operate the press.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit... Good quality, stuffed burgers look beautiful and taste even better. The grill mat is awesome too, you can grill just about anything on it. Cleans very easily. The recipes on their website is a nice touch, tried a bunch of them. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Bravo

customer_reviews.title: This burger press kit is great because it comes with both a regular sized template ...
customer_reviews.text: This burger press kit is great because it comes with both a regular sized template and a slider sized template. It can guarantee evenly sized burgers or sliders every time for perfect and even cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Irina P.

customer_reviews.title: I immediately loved it! It was SUPER easy for me to ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW! For the best burgers ever, you need this professional press. It molds your patties to a perfect shape and thinkness. If you prefer think and juicy or the thinner style. Burger press is easy to use and easier to clean. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg DeAlto

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Durable and easy to use. This is really helpful for making stuffed burgers. I used the slider press to make my cheese mixture into a disc to stuff into the burger press. Precut parchment paper is really handy too.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Shumway

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing product! Work perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing product! Work perfectly, I‘m making stuffed patties for the family. I followed their recipes from the videos, so good! I like the grill mat too. Use it to cook chicken wings in the oven. great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Visa

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect size burgers
customer_reviews.text: This burger presser is great. It comes with a mat inside also. It’s very easy to use and makes perfect size burgers. Highly recommend this product if you’re like me and like making burgers from scratch
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, It makes it very simple to make burgers.
customer_reviews.author: Wilmarie andino

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean! Mat is a nice addition
customer_reviews.author: the turtle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use and also kept my hands clean. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: daiquiriya martinez

product_meta.title: Solar Fountain Pump, Free Standing 1.4W Bird Bath Fountain Pump for Garden and Patio, Solar Panel Kit Water Pump
product_meta.description:
Size:BigSolar Fountain Pump – Free Floating Fountain Kit Solar Pump Premium Quality Black Eco-Friendly 
Outdoor Bird Bath Watering Decorating Garden Water Fountain presents the new Solar Bird Bath Fountain Pump. 

Make your neighbors feel envious with this stunning bird bath. 

Solar birdbath fountain is made of highly efficient solar panel and new brushless pump. 

Solar panel is made of premium quality Polycrystalline Silicon. 

This is a waterproof product and an indispensable pump for your garden. 

Comes with four different nozzles which can easily change the height of the water. 

It can floats on the water and no need electricity, will run automatically when the sunlight hit the solar panel. 

The solar fountain pump can take some dynamic beauty, the spraying water attracted birds, butterflies and dragonflies, bring so much vitality to your garden. 

Perfect for the bird bath, fish tank, small pond, pool, garden, patio, lawn, water circulation for oxygen, and etc. 

Easy to Install
1.
Please remove the film covering the solar panel before use 
2.
And then remove the plug from the plug
3.
Next run the pump for a few seconds to allow air to escape from the pump
4.
Finally plug it in and see whether it works

SPECIFICATION

Solar panel: 7V/1.4W, Diameter: 6.3"

Brushless pump input: DC 4.5-10V

Maximum quantity of flow: 40gallons/H

Maximum delivery height: 18", Regular: 10~15"

Minimum water depth in fountain should be 1 3/4"
feature_bullets: ☀Solar Fountain: This fountain pump is a solar pump with excellent performance, which is completely controlled by solar energy.

☀Free-Standing Floating Fountain Pump: Solar fountain is easy to operate. You just need to float the solar water pump on the water and fully expose the solar panel to the sun. After getting enough sunlight, it will work automatically in a few seconds. The stronger the sun, the better the fountain.

☀Sprayer for Various Water Types: Solar fountains come with 4 different styles of nozzles, which can satisfy your different needs of spray height or spray shape. The height of the fountain water depends on the intensity of the sun, and the fountain water can rise up to about 30 - 50 cm.

☀Exquisite Garden Decoration: This environmentally friendly solar pump is perfect for bird baths, ponds, fish tanks, gardens, swimming pools, oxygen circulating water. Your yard will definitely draw the most attention from passersby. Make your garden look so fun decorated with solar fountain pumps.

☀ Pro-Tips: Make sure that have enough water to completely submerge the pump. Keep the water, panels, and pumps clean, making sure that no shadows cover the panel or block the pump. The fountain pump works only when all panels are fully exposed to direct sunlight.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,362 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
